name: Essence
savepath: Disabled the property display of 'Level X Charm Aura When Equipped' on charms. Side-effect; also hides any existing properties on items that had auras when equipped. The aura still functions as it did before; the display on item is just disabled. New items found or made will properly display their aura property. Changed Fade skill on the Treachery runeword from cast when struck to charges
